title: temp fix for #1
message:
temp fix for #1

Catch the exception, so the app will not crash even if there is a
SQLiteException being thrown

title: update UI
message:
update UI

shorten the space between cards

title: refactor the code
message:
refactor the code

First of all, we use two query method instead of one raw query, which
simplify the flow;
Then we extract the translator from English input code to Chinese input
code, which shorten the getInputCode method

title: update database
message:
update database

use cangjie database provided in tsekityam/Cangjie-Database-Builder
instead, which has a smaller size.

title: fix: return unique id for each list view items
message: fix: return unique id for each list view items

title: update UI
message:
update UI

The most important changes are:
put search box and the result boxes into card views;
remove divider from the app;
adjust the relationship of the search box and result list

Now the 1st item in the list is dummy, used to occupy space used by the
search box. i.e. the real 1st result will not be covered by the search
box
